allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "UPDATE payments SET created_at = payment_date, updated_at = payment_date WHERE created_at IS NULL;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "ALTER TABLE clients MODIFY nationality VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT ''Cameroun'', ADD COLUMN region VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER nationality, ADD COLUMN department VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER region;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "ALTER TABLE payments ADD COLUMN transferred_to_bank BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER status, ADD COLUMN bank_transfer_date DATE NULL AFTER transferred_to_bank, ADD COLUMN bank_transfer_reference VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER bank_transfer_date, ADD COLUMN bank_transfer_notes TEXT NULL AFTER bank_transfer_reference, ADD COLUMN transferred_by BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL AFTER bank_transfer_notes;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as client_count FROM clients;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT id, firstname, lastname, phone, email, is_active FROM clients LIMIT 3;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT id, firstname, lastname, date_of_birth, passport_expiry_date FROM clients WHERE id = 2;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT id, firstname, lastname, date_of_birth FROM clients WHERE id = 2;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT p.id, p.client_id, p.campaign_id, c.name, c.start_date FROM pilgrims p LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON p.campaign_id = c.id WHERE p.client_id = 2;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT p.id, p.client_id, p.campaign_id, c.name, c.departure_date FROM pilgrims p LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON p.campaign_id = c.id WHERE p.client_id = 2;")
